name: Sheepocalypze (Prototype)
description:
A first-person runner type of game!
Save all sheep and collect coins while holding of monsters! Improve your stats and play for a better highscore!

This is a project I have been working on for sometime now and intend to continue developing abit (depending of how much I like what it's becoming).

Right now I need feedback from you guys, so please write in comments what you did/didn't like about it, or if you should have any ideas of what I could add to improve!

I am not sure if I have made everything clear enough with controls and such so I will put some temporary tips:
* To create a unique sheep u have to aim at a normal sheep and then press 1-3 (will be more sheep avaible later) and then have enough fatigue to create it (might change this, will see).
* Firing a projectile at a unique sheep will make it follow you, and then fire again to make it unfollow.

If you should find a bug, feel free to write in comments and I will try my best fixing it. I am also aware that some screen resolutions might (not sure) screw up UI, so if you should notice UI not fitting the screen I would be very greatful knowing your screen resolution!

There are ony two maps at the moment and one of them is just my test map, but I will hopefully add more in the future!

All models and textures are made by me, except for terrain and grass textures which are from http://www.cgtextures.com/.

Skyboxes are from: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/18353.
Audio is from: https://freesound.org/.

The game was made in Unity3D.
